pref_name: Constantine VII Porphyrogenitus, Emperor of the East, 905-959

rel_con.label: Constantine VII Porphyrogenitus, Emperor of the East, 905-959
Constantine VII Porphyrogenitus, Emperor of the East, 905-959
Constantine VII Porphyrogenitus, Emperor of the East, 905-959

Notes.value: 17 May 905 – 9 November 959) was the fourth Emperor of the Macedonian dynasty of the Byzantine Empire, reigning from 6 June 913 to 9 November 959. He was the son of Emperor Leo VI and his fourth wife, Zoe Karbonopsina, and the nephew of his predecessor Emperor Alexander.
